name: fullstack pokemon game
tools: JavaScript, ES6, Node.js (express.js, mysql2, sequelize, nodemon, dotenv, express-handlebars), Heroku, PokéAPI, Socket.io
role: I was working on the frontend of the project, working closely with footer and troubleshooting issues before deploying
about: A simple game built around the idea of 'drafting' a Pokémon team. Players are able to review stats of 'free agent' pokemon to draft and claim them, with the data saved for future play.
